chinese: 他一再地表示亲近使她很反感。

english: Swanson was not heated or antipathetic .
chinese: 斯万生并不发火，也不现出反感。
大家对他的拙劣发言均很反感。

english: He stood in the opposition and irritated mood .
chinese: 他有着敌视，反感的情绪。

english: Edgar must shake off his antipathy .
chinese: 埃德加必得消除对他的反感。
反感造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: He had an antipathy to the sound of his voice .
chinese: 他一听见他的声音就起反感。

english: His speech caused a lot of feeling .
chinese: 他的讲演引起了很多反感。

english: She spoke of him with great dislike .
I felt instinctively negative toward stevenson .
chinese: 我对史蒂文森却本能地有反感。
吉尔伯特有些反感，心里发惊。

english: The mere idea of stealing had been repugnant .
chinese: 光是偷盗这种想法就很令人反感。

english: Excision of an obnoxious passage was required .
chinese: 有一段引起反感的文字必须删掉。
